workflow.name: Generate workflows from natural language using GPT-4o Mini and n8nBuilder API
workflow.description:
## ü§ñ AI-Powered n8n Workflow Generator with n8nBuilder API

### Overview

This workflow lets you **generate complete n8n workflows from natural language descriptions** using the **n8nBuilder API**. üöÄ

Users submit a short description via a form, and the workflow returns a ready-to-import n8n workflow JSON.

**Why use it?**

- ‚ö° **AI-generated workflows** from natural language 
- üõ†Ô∏è **Production-ready patterns** (triggers, error handling, best practices)
- üéØ **Perfect for beginners** who don't know which nodes to pick
- üîÑ **Two modes**: Form-based and AI Chat Agent

---

## Prerequisites

- üîë **n8nBuilder account + API token** ‚Äî Get your free token at [n8nbuilder.dev](https://n8nbuilder.dev)
- üè¢ **An n8n instance** (Cloud or self-hosted)
- ü§ñ **OpenAI API Key** (Optional - to use with AI Agents)

‚ö†Ô∏è **Important**: Never expose your API key in public workflows. Use **n8n Credentials** for production setups.

---

## Setup Instructions

### 1. Get your n8nBuilder API token

- Visit [n8nbuilder.dev](https://n8nbuilder.dev)
- Sign up or log in to your account
- Navigate to Account ‚Üí API to generate your token

### 2. Configure the Form

The **Form Trigger** collects:

- `api_token` (required) ‚Äî Your n8nBuilder API token
- `email` (required) ‚Äî Your email address
- `query` (required) ‚Äî Natural language description of the workflow (e.g., "Read RSS from https://n8nbuilder.dev/blog/feed.xml every hour and send Slack message if new post arrives")

### 3. Workflow Execution

1. User fills the form and submits
2. Workflow sends a **POST** request to `https://api.n8nbuilder.dev/api/generate`
3. n8nBuilder API processes the request and generates a complete workflow
4. Response is cleaned and formatted
5. User receives the generated workflow JSON ready to import

### 4. Outputs

The workflow returns:

- `output` ‚Äî Complete n8n workflow JSON ready to import

üí° **Tip**: Copy the generated JSON and import it directly into your n8n instance via Settings ‚Üí Workflows ‚Üí Import from File.

---

## Customization Tips

- üìù **Write clear descriptions**: The more specific your query, the better the generated workflow
- üé® **Try different use cases**: Data transformation, API integrations, scheduled tasks, webhooks, etc.
- üîß **Edit after generation**: Generated workflows are production-ready but you can always customize them further
- ü§ñ **Use AI Chat mode**: Enable the AI Agent for conversational workflow generation

---

## Alternative: Use the n8nBuilder Community Node

üéÅ **Optional**: Install the `n8n-nodes-n8nbuilder` community node if you prefer using a dedicated node instead of raw HTTP.

See: [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/mbakgun/n8n-nodes-n8nbuilder)

---

## Troubleshooting

- **401/403 Unauthorized** ‚Üí Check your API token in the form
- **Invalid JSON** ‚Üí Ensure your email and query are properly filled
- **No output returned** ‚Üí Verify your API token is valid and active
- **Slow response** ‚Üí Complex workflows may take a few seconds to generate

---

## Security Best Practices

- üîí Do not hardcode API tokens in public workflows
- üîê Use **n8n Credentials** for storing tokens securely
- üõ°Ô∏è Keep your API token private and regenerate if compromised

---

## Learn More

- üìö [n8nBuilder Documentation](https://n8nbuilder.dev)

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful assistant which creates n8n workflows. 

Your top priority is to forward request to "Generate Workflow Tool" tool. 

After gathering the response from the tool, simply return it as a response.

values.placeholder: Enter your API token from n8nbuilder.dev
Example: Read RSS from https://example.com/feed.xml every hour and send Slack message if new post arrives

parameters.formDescription: Generate complete n8n workflows from natural language descriptions using the n8nBuilder API

parameters.completionMessage:
=**Your workflow is ready!**

**Generated at:** {{ $json.timestamp }}

**What you asked for:** {{ $json.query_description }}

---

**Next Steps:**
1. Copy the JSON code below
2. Go to your n8n instance
3. Click the "+" button - "Import from File" or "Import from URL"
4. Paste the JSON code
5. Configure any required credentials
6. Activate your workflow!

---

**Generated Workflow JSON:**
```json
{{ $json.output }}
```

---

**Tips:**
- Make sure to replace placeholder credentials
- Test the workflow before activating it
- Check all node connections

**Need help?** Visit [n8n Community](https://community.n8n.io)

=**Oops! Something went wrong.**

**Possible reasons:**

1. **Invalid API Token**
   - Check your token at [n8nbuilder.dev/dashboard](https://n8nbuilder.dev/dashboard)
   - Make sure you copied it correctly

2. **API Limit Reached**
   - Free tier has usage limits
   - Check your quota in the dashboard

3. **Invalid Request**
   - Description might be too vague
   - Try being more specific

4. **Network Issues**
   - API might be temporarily unavailable
   - Try again in a few moments

---

**What to do:**
- Double-check your API token
- Try with a simpler workflow description
- Contact [support](https://n8nbuilder.dev/support) if issue persists

**Response received:**
```
{{ $json.output || 'No response from API' }}
```

parameters.content:
## How it works

1. Choose your mode: Form, AI Chat, or Webhook
2. Enter your n8nBuilder API token and workflow description
3. API generates a complete n8n workflow JSON
4. Copy the output and import into your n8n instance

## Setup steps

1. Get API token from n8nbuilder.dev
2. For AI Chat: Configure OpenAI credentials and update token in "Generate Workflow Tool" node
3. Activate the workflow
4. Access Form URL, Chat URL, or Webhook URL to start generating

AI Chat Mode

Conversational workflow generation using OpenAI.
Configure OpenAI credentials and update YOUR_EMAIL_ADRESS / YOUR_USER_TOKEN in the tool node.

Form Mode

Simple form-based workflow generation.
Users enter API token, email, and workflow description.

Response and Error Handling

Validates API response and displays success or error message to the user.

Advanced Options

Community Node Available:
npm install n8n-nodes-n8nbuilder

GitHub: github.com/mbakgun/n8n-nodes-n8nbuilder

Example Use Cases:
- RSS to Slack notifications
- GitHub webhook processors
- Data sync workflows
- API integrations

Webhook Mode

Programmatic API integration. POST to /webhook/generate-workflow with JSON body: { "api_token": "...", "email": "...", "query": "..." }

Response and Error Handling

Validates API response and displays success or error message to the user.

user.name: Mehmet Burak Akg√ºn
user.bio:
Create n8n Workflows in Seconds with AI
Transform your ideas into powerful n8n workflows using natural language. 

Pay only for what you use. No subscriptions, no commitments. No n8n API key required.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
